title: Inro, Ojime and Netsuke
description: four-case inro; fundame decorated in hiramakie with leaping karashishi holding peony flower in mouth; reverse with another shishi on gold ground; bead ojime; ivory netsuke of herb gatherer drowsing beside basket with flowers and sickle; attached with brown, braided, silk rope through inro and ties at bottom
creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
